item.title: 0001.Two Sum
item.description: 1. Two Sum # 题目 # Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice. Example: Given nums = [2, 7, 11, 15], target = 9, Because nums[0] + nums[1] = 2 + 7 = 9, return [0, 1] 代码 # use std::collections::HashMap; impl Solution { pub fn two_sum(nums: Vec<i32>, target: i32) -> Vec<i32> { let mut numbers: HashMap<i32, i32> = HashMap::new(); for (idx, value) in nums.
